title: Champion Heritage Boys Base Layer Athletic Long Sleeve Cold Gear T Shirt Top Kids Clothes
features: CHAMPION HERITAGE COLLECTION: celebrating the brands DNA and offering signature Champion looks you have come to know and love over the last 100 years! Match these back to your favorite bottoms

This cold gear base layer youth athletic long sleeve performance t-shirt is Ideal for your kids to either lounge casually at home or play sports like exercising, basketball, soccer, football, running, kickboxing, skiing, ice skating, hockey, baseball, in style.

This boys sports thermal t shirt top protects your kids' muscles and joints from getting injured, enhance sports effect and shorten recovery time after workouts the 4-way stretch construction and tag less design help move better and reduce irritation

COMFORT:Super smooth and soft polyester fabric ensures a pleasant and supple touch without irritation even with prolonged wear. the close-fitting style does better in retaining body heat to keep you warm.
100% polyester Machine washable, regular fit, No fleece lined
description: Authentic American Athleticwear: For nearly 100 years we’ve been a leader in sports apparel, shaping the industry as we know it. BRAND ATTRIBUTES Trustworthy-You don’t buy trust. It’s not gained overnight. Trust takes time, commitment, consistency. We earn it and re-earn it every day. Inclusive-We believe that all are welcome, on the field and in life. As a brand, our field has no fences. The clubhouse of Champion has no membership fees. Passionate-Passion is the driving force of greatness. It’s doing what you do, no matter what that is, simply for the love of it, day in, day out. Passion is the fuel that stokes the fire of every champion. Confident-Before you can believe in anything else, you need to believe in yourself. We celebrate who we are. We fly our own personal colors and are proud of them. Competitive-We believe in playing to win. Every day, every challenge we see as an opportunity to take ourselves to a higher place. Healthy competition keeps us sharp. Bring it on.
